flawed_nl_solution:
On Thursday 15*3=<<15*3=45>>45 books were sold.
On Friday 45/5=<<45/5=9>>9 books were sold
Adding up all three days 15+45+9=<<15+45+9=70>>70 books were sold by Friday
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 69, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
